full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 798 Filed 08/01/25 Page 1 of 1 UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, - against - GHISLAINE MAXWELL, Defendant. 20 Cr. 330 (PAE) NOTICE OF MOTION TO WITHDRAW PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that, upon the accompanying Declaration of Christian R. Everdell, I respectfully move this Court for an Order pursuant to Local Rule 1.4 permitting myself, Mark S. Cohen, and Cohen & Gresser LLP to withdraw as co-counsel for defendant Ghislaine Maxwell. Dated: August 1, 2025 New York, New York Respectfully submitted, COHEN & GRESSER LLP Christian R. Everdell Mark S. Cohen 800 Third Avenue, 21st Floor New York, NY 10022 Phone: (212) 957-7600 Fax: (212) 957-4514 ceverdell@cohengresser.com mcohen@cohengresser.com Attorneys for Ghislaine Maxwell DOJ-OGR-00015074

text_blocks.content: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, - against - GHISLAINE MAXWELL, Defendant.
20 Cr. 330 (PAE) NOTICE OF MOTION TO WITHDRAW

PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that, upon the accompanying Declaration of Christian R. Everdell, I respectfully move this Court for an Order pursuant to Local Rule 1.4 permitting myself, Mark S. Cohen, and Cohen & Gresser LLP to withdraw as co-counsel for defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Dated: August 1, 2025 New York, New York

Christian R. Everdell Mark S. Cohen 800 Third Avenue, 21st Floor New York, NY 10022 Phone: (212) 957-7600 Fax: (212) 957-4514 ceverdell@cohengresser.com mcohen@cohengresser.com Attorneys for Ghislaine Maxwell

additional_notes: The document appears to be a formal legal notice with a signature. The date 'August 1, 2025' is likely a future date at the time of the document's creation, suggesting the document may be a template or example rather than an actual filed document.
